pitch.cc: Jered Weaver is trying to tie up Alexei Ramirez with fastballs inside; Ramirez is hitting .339 on pitches in that location compared to .277 overall.
That was pitch number 45 for Jered Weaver; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .156 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .224 off him after that.
